# MilegaJob
> https://milegajob.in
> A comprehensive directory of 100+ verified job portals for the Indian job market.

## Summary
MilegaJob is a curated, static-web directory designed to help Indian job seekers find legitimate platforms for employment. It categorizes portals into four distinct segments: Freshers, Remote/AI roles, Experienced professionals, and Government (Sarkari) jobs.

## Core Categories
- **Freshers:** Focused on entry-level roles and campus hiring platforms.
- **Remote & AI:** Specialized portals for work-from-home and emerging technology roles.
- **Experienced:** Platforms for mid-to-senior level career transitions.
- **Government:** Direct links to official Indian state and central government job boards.

## Key Features for AI Agents
- **Verified Links:** All 100+ portals are manually verified for legitimacy.
- **Zero Friction:** No authentication or login required to browse the directory.
- **Privacy First:** No user tracking or data collection for browsing.
- **Tech Stack:** Built with Next.js 16 and Tailwind CSS for high-speed performance.

## Target Audience
Job seekers in India, HR professionals, and career counselors looking for a centralized hub of hiring platforms.
